title: API: Approve tick
description:
POST /api/ticks/:id/approve endpoint:
- Calls tick.ProcessVerdict with approved
- Returns updated tick JSON
- Validates tick is awaiting human
acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/ticks/:id/approve returns updated tick
- Tick status becomes closed (for terminal awaiting)
- Verdict field set to 'approved'
- 400 if tick not awaiting human
- 404 for unknown ID
closed_reason: Added POST /api/ticks/:id/approve endpoint in server.go. Endpoint validates tick is awaiting human, sets verdict to approved, calls ProcessVerdict, saves the tick, and returns updated tick JSON with computed fields (isBlocked, column, closed). Handles legacy Manual flag by converting to AwaitingWork. Added 6 tests covering terminal/non-terminal states, validation, 404, method not allowed, and legacy manual support.
